subject: Programming
title: Recommendation Algorithms
description: A quick win: understand Recommendation Algorithms.

hook.text: Netflix says 80% of what people watch comes from its recommendation algorithm.

buildup.text: Collaborative filtering finds users with similar taste and suggests what they liked.

discovery.text: If a thousand users who loved Movie A also loved Movie B, you'll probably like Movie B too.

twist.text: Filter bubbles form. The algorithm keeps showing what you already like, narrowing your world.

climax.text: Recommendation algorithms shape culture. They decide what millions of people see and hear.

punchline.text: Algorithms curate what the world watches.

quiz.question: What is collaborative filtering based on?
